summary: batch files to make your character the ULTIMATE DRAGONBORN!
descriptionHtml:
What it is:
These are files meant for people who have already conquered skyrim and/or just want to be all powerful and slaughter anything that moves, or something like that. be sure to read the descriptions in each file so you know what each one does. they both are cheat files but one is REALLY CHEATING! read the files and you\'ll see what i mean.


Future updates: 
probably won\'t edit or update the files any unless there are requests for changes or new features. if anyone wants me to edit or add anything to them just let me know and I\'ll get on it.


Just a note:
satintomcat uploaded a file called Skyrim Character Editor which makes the batch file creation process much less tedious. be sure to check out his mod at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3142 to create your own batch files!
author: gamerlord48
